quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.

Cold! If the thermometer had been an inch longer we'd have frozen to death.
In the cold dark days of the winter, dream about the flowers to get warmed up!
Man dies of cold, not of darkness.
Let me be the first to tell you, drinking alcohol is the worst thing to do in cold weather. Hot soup is the best because the process of digesting food helps to warm you up.
This weather is almost colder than my heart.
In cold weather a good rule is to light your fire first before doing anything else. It is always more sensible to keep yourself warm rather than trying to thaw yourself out later.

The cold cut like a many bladed knife.
If you are cold at night, let the promise of my love cover you like a warm blanket.
Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.

It was so cold I almost got married.

Winter in the soul can be an uncomfortable season as well.
He scatters the frost like ashes' over the once green meadows of our joy and 'hurls down his hail like pebbles', freezing the streams of our delight.

The playground was an exciting place but it could be a litttle dangerous during icy weather or after snow had fallen.

The rains of autumn have now fairly yielded to the frosts of winter: our long season of cold weather has set in..
And skies their wintry sterness wear.
